[color=#ff0000]DON'T DISCONNECT FROM AHELPS OR YOU GET AN APPEAL-ONLY BAN[/color]
[color=#a4885c]0.[/color] [color=#a4885c]The[/color] [color=#ffd700]Golden[/color] [color=#a4885c]Rule.[/color] Admins have final say. Rules lawyers will be taken out back and executed.
[color=#a4885c]1.[/color] Don't metacomm.
[color=#a4885c]2.[/color] Glowies, Deltards, Floof players, and Wizshills need not apply.
[color=#a4885c]3.[/color] No ERP, that's lame and gay. Rape is equally banned.
[color=#a4885c]4.[/color] Choose a real character name. No Rizzler, Adolf Hitler, or Cherry Garcia.
[color=#a4885c]5.[/color] Play your character and don't be a round ruining dick.
[color=#a4885c]6.[/color] The Rule of Cool.
